query.statement:
SELECT CESDLPJT, CESDLHNO, CESDLSNM, CESDLHDM, CESDLUPD, CESDLNAP, CESDLBJD, CESDLSEL, CESDLRCP, CESDLREQ,
(SELECT ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.zmaster01 WHERE MANDT=A.MANDT AND POSID=CESDLPJT) ZSITE_NM, (SELECT addr1 || addr2 || '(' || zsite_tel || ')' FROM SAPHEE.zmaster01 WHERE MANDT=A.MANDT AND POSID=CESDLPJT) ADDR, (SELECT NAMET FROM SAPHEE.zpst0011 WHERE MANDT=#G_MANDT# AND temno=C.temno AND RETIF = '') NAMET, (SELECT NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.zmmt012 WHERE MANDT=#G_MANDT# AND lifnr=C.lifnr) NAME1, zspec1, zspec7, zspec11,
B.CESDAREP CESDAREP FROM SAPHEE.ZTBESDL A ,SAPHEE.ZTBESDA B ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 C WHERE a.CESDLPJT = #PJT# AND B.CESDAREP = #REP# AND CESDLHNO = #HNO# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CESDLPJT =B.CESDAPJT AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CESDLPJT = C.POSID AND A.CESDLHNO = RIGHT(C.POSID_1,3)
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
